descriptionHtml:
Reference to Katana of the Mummylord from NWN 1 HotU (Hordes of the Underdark)


Based on the akaviri katana, comes with poison enchantment. Has upgraded damage in comparison to regular katana. The enchantment is the poison effect you would get from a dart trap in a dungeon, so when you strike, a poison cloud will surround your victim. Looking a lil like corpseflies.

Can be smithed at any forge and upgraded at a grindstone.
author: Ragnarokum
